text:
V. Karthik (13), an eighth class student, drowned in a tank at Kuzhipatti near here on Sunday.

A mill worker Muthu Raj (21) and Karthik were bathing while the latter suddenly drowned. Muthu Raj tried to rescue him but in vain. Local fishermen near the tank saved Muthu Raj and admitted him to Dindigul Government Hospital. However, they could not rescue the boy.

Later, fire and rescue service personnel retrieved the body from the tank after an hour-long search. A case has been registered.
title: Boy drowns in tank
